title: Dem lawmakers criticize Trump's first 100 days
shortDescription: Democratic lawmaker Rep. Hakeem Jeffries criticized the job Donald Trump has done as president in the first 100 days of his second term.

title: 'Two dolls instead of 30': Trump acknowledges family budgets will be tight
shortDescription: Donald Trump, who has argued that China will bear the brunt of his tariffs, acknowledged the duties may mean fewer, more expensive products.

title: Judge puts the brakes on Trump's Guantanamo deportations
shortDescription: U.S. District Judge Brian Murphy ordered the Trump administration to ensure migrants held at the American military base in Cuba get due process.

title: Trump orders agencies to work with Musk on massive cuts
shortDescription: President Donald Trump ordered U.S. agencies to work closely with top adviser Elon Musk's effort to shrink the federal workforce.

title: A Musk send off? Trump says DOGE chief 'wants to get home to his cars'
shortDescription: President Trump's Cabinet secretaries gave Elon Musk a hearty round of applause Wednesday as the Tesla CEO soon begins a reduced role with DOGE.

title: Who is Timothy Dolan? Trump shares his pick for the next pope
shortDescription: President Donald Trump pointed to New York archbishop as his choice for the papacy. Does he have a shot?

title: President Trump blames shrinking economy on Biden
shortDescription: At a cabinet meeting, President Donald Trump blamed shrinking economic growth in the first quarter of the year on Joe Biden.

title: Trump admin removes Doug Emhoff, Biden picks from Holocaust council
shortDescription: In response to his removal from the Holocaust Memorial Council, former second gentleman Doug Emhoff said Holocaust remembrance "should never be politicized."

title: Supreme Court fight may shape Trump's ability to fire Fed chair
shortDescription: When the Supreme Court rules on Trump trying to remove two federal labor board members, Fed Chair Jerome Powell may get clues about his job security.

title: Day 101: Trump's triumphant start hits an economic roadblock
shortDescription: Dismiss the Democrats? Sure. Question the polls? Of course. But the hard, cold reality of a contracting economy are a president's nightmare.

title: We asked 100 Michiganders about Trump’s first 100 days: Here’s what they said
shortDescription: Residents across Michigan’s cities, suburbs, and small towns reflect on the impact of President Donald Trump’s early days in office.

title: Trump's approval rating holds at 42% in new poll. Here's why.
shortDescription: In the final Reuters/Ipsos poll of April, Trump's approval rating holds at 42% amid concerns over the economy and immigration.

title: 'A hug?!?' Liberals wack Whitmer for embracing Trump
shortDescription: As Democrats face calls from their own voters to do more to stand against Trump, Michigan's Gretchen Whitmer is caught in a sticky game of optics

title: Congress starts working on Trump's 'big beautiful bill' | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: Trump provides automakers some relief from 25% tariffs. | Republicans propose a massive overhaul of student loans and Pell Grants.

title: President Trump relaxes tariffs on car makers
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order to relax some auto tariffs, though the industry won't see a total exemption.

title: 'BE PATIENT!!!': Trump reacts to new report on the economy
shortDescription: A new report shows the first decline in the U.S. economy in three years. Trump urged patience and said his tariffs will lead to boom 'like no other.'

title: Trump jokingly says he'd like to be pope: 'Number one choice'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Tuesday jokingly said he’d like to be the next leader of the Roman Catholic Church, days after Pope Francis, 88, died.

title: Trump jokes: ‘I’d like to be pope’
shortDescription: When asked about who he'd want to be elected as the next pope, President Donald Trump joked before saying he has no preference.

title: 125,000 Canadian auto workers brace for Trump's tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to hike the 25% tariffs on Canadian cars. Canada's auto workers already fear the worst.

title: Trump's impact on climate so far
shortDescription: Since taking office, President Trump has abandoned efforts to reduce global warming. It could “take a generation or more to repair the damage."

title: 'Never kneel': China taps Korean War and AI memes to hit back at Trump
shortDescription: China is leveraging its propaganda machine to hit back at U.S. tariffs, rolling out videos using Cold War imagery to lambaste "imperialists."

title: Trump seeks to boost coal jobs. Some miners worry about safety
shortDescription: Hopes that Donald Trump's executive orders will revive the coal industry have been tempered by the administration's cuts to mine safety programs.
